mapper.insert: insert into commodity_attribute (commodity_attribute_id, commodity_id, category_attribute_id, commodity_attribute_name, commodity_attribute_value) values (#{commodity_attribute_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category_attribute_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commodity_attribute_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodity_attribute_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select commodity_attribute_id, commodity_id, category_attribute_id, commodity_attribute_name, commodity_attribute_value from commodity_attribute where commodity_attribute_id = #{commodity_attribute_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select commodity_attribute_id, commodity_id, category_attribute_id, commodity_attribute_name, commodity_attribute_value from commodity_attribute
